Refunds by law: In Australia, consumers have a legal right to obtain a refund from a business for goods purchased if the goods are faulty, not fit for purpose or don't match description. More information at RETURN OR EXCHANGE OF GOODS: Return or exchange of items will gladly be accepted if the product is faulty, unfit for purpose or does not match the sample or description. We will offer you a repair, exchange or refund. Some items will require the manufacturers confirmation of fault before processing. Return or exchange of electrical items will attract stricter guidelines based upon third party (supplier) constraints on TJam Auto. None of these restraints will breach your legal rights. Right of refusal for the return or exchange of products is at the discretion of TJam Auto, except where the Trade Practices Act of Australia makes allowance. A restocking fee of up to 20% may apply to returned goods if you simply have “changed your mind”. Items must be returned in original packaging with all instruction manuals and accessories included. Delivery or Postage costs are non-refundable. Return
